answers.answer: They just told me my sugar level and that i passed which they said in an hr i dropped bk to 80 so that stuff ran right through me i suppose. They said  70-140 i believe was the norm They really didnt give me any details except I was doing great and didnt have any risk for the diabetes.

question: I had my 1 hr glucose test yesterday and my results posted online this morning. Im curious what everyones results were and the outcome. My results for both tests were 1 # lower than standard range. Is that ok? Standard range i believe was like 11.5-14 and mine was 10.5. Both my other pregnancies i was right in tge middle so i never inquired about it. Thanks :-)
title: 1 hour glucose tolerance test
